description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for a ground penetrating radar and local services to allow electricians and masons to scan the concrete to ensure no piping, conduit or rebar that will be obstructing their way when drilling or coring.
full_summary:
**Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) Tender**
==================================================================

### Tender Details

*   **Title**: Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) System and Local Services
*   **Reference Number**: CB-777-85133123
*   **Solicitation Number**: 10078200
*   **Publication Date**: March 5, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 20, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires a Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) system and local services to facilitate electricians and masons in scanning concrete to ensure that no piping, conduit, or rebar is obstructing their drilling or coring operations.

### Tender Conditions

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity**: Public Services and Procurement Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Contact**: Kevin Godard, (613) 858-7891, kevin.godard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available on the Canada Buy Service website:

*   **English Notice**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33452/ground-penetrating-radar---rfp-en\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33452/ground-penetrating-radar---rfp-en\_0.pdf)
*   **English Amendment**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33452/ground-penetrating-radar---rfp-amd-001-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33452/ground-penetrating-radar---rfp-amd-001-en.pdf)
*   **French Notice**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33452/georadar---rfp-fr.pdf](https://canad
